titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of S.M.A.R.T. Parent Day, and inviting State and local governments to recognize this day.
Supporting the goals and ideals of S.M.A.R.T. Parent Day, and inviting State and local governments to recognize this day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of S.M.A.R.T. Parent Day.
Encourages families, children, and schools to recognize the importance of social media awareness and have conversations about its appropriate uses and timing.
